key_title: Key to the species of Critesion murinum

breadcrumbs.key_title: Key to the species of Critesion

source.author: Walsh, N.G.
source.title: Poaceae
source.in_title: Flora of Victoria. Vol. 2. Ferns and Allied Plants, Conifers and Monocotyledons
source.citation: From: Walsh, N.G. (1994). Poaceae. In: Walsh, N.G.; Entwisle, T.J. (eds), Flora of Victoria. Vol. 2. Ferns and Allied Plants, Conifers and Monocotyledons. Inkata Press, Melbourne.

leads.lead_text: Anthers of central floret c. 1 mm long, usually pale, at least half as long as those of lateral florets; article of rachis 2.5 mm long or more; leaves green

Anthers of the central floret 0.2–0.5 mm long, usually blackish, less than half as long as those of lateral florets; article of rachis on which the triad of florets are united c. 2 mm long; leaves commonly glaucous
